installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# starmade Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apk update
apk add curl

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

curl -sSL -o starter.jar https://files.star-made.org/StarMade-Starter.jar

java -jar starter.jar -nogui

mv ./StarMade/* ./
rm -r ./StarMade

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
